description: Try our easy to follow Choc-Mint Biscuits recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Choc-Mint Biscuits Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Meanwhile, beat remaining butter until pale and creamy. Gradually beat in icing sugar until smooth. Beat in essence, colour and chocolate. Sandwich biscuits with mint filling. Serve or store in an airtight container for up to 5 days.
